All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BookingManager
BookingManager is a control class which handles bookings by the user.
MovieDisplayManager
Contains static methods to display Movie Listings for movie-goers.
MovieListingManager
Contains static methods for admin to add/edit/remove a cinema movie from the Movie Listing.
ReviewManager
Contains static methods for movie-goers to add a review to a cinema movie.
ShowTimeManager
Contains static methods for Admin to add/edit/remove Show Times.
SystemManager
A manager class to help admin to create public holidays and change price adjustment
